abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32870641, pmid32845280, pmid32870516, pmid32634129, pmid32865669, pmid32859298, pmid32860454, pmid32866323, pmid32846001
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.09.03
